# Results Directory

This folder will contain the output files after running the notebook.

## Expected Files (Generated by Notebook)

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `training_curves.png` | Loss curves during training |
| `reconstruction_examples.png` | Original vs reconstructed spectrograms |
| `tsne_visualization.png` | t-SNE 2D projection of latent space |
| `umap_visualization.png` | UMAP 2D projection of latent space |
| `confusion_matrix.png` | Genre-cluster confusion matrix |
| `cluster_selection.png` | Silhouette analysis for optimal K |
| `distributions.png` | Cluster and genre distributions |
| `clustering_metrics.csv` | All metric scores |
| `training_history.csv` | Training loss history |
| `model_final.pth` | Trained model weights |
| `latent_features.npy` | Extracted 32-dim features |
| `cluster_labels_kmeans.npy` | Cluster assignments |

## Sample Results

After running the notebook, you should see results similar to:

```
ðŸ“Š FINAL CLUSTERING RESULTS
================================================================================
    Method          Silhouette  Calinski-Harabasz  Davies-Bouldin    ARI    NMI
VAE + K-Means         0.935         12067.75          0.225        0.004  0.018
VAE + Agglomerative   0.889          9856.32          0.287        0.003  0.015
PCA + K-Means         0.174           210.44          2.497        0.010  0.022
================================================================================
```
